Conjuration 1

Summon Ko-Oni

MA Shinuyama,  LA Jomon

Ritual
D1
spell id [id]: 447
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 1260
number of effects [nreff]: 505
gems required [gemcost]: 7D
Summon Units:#1260 Ko-Oni x 5+[1/2 lvl]
This spell summons six Ko-Oni. Ko-Oni are small mischievous demons from the wild mountains of Yomi. They are ugly and wild with staring eyes, unkempt red hair and pot-bellies. They have clawed feet, fangs and porcine faces. Most Oni dress in tiger skins and wield clubs. Oni don't need to eat. However, they have tremendous appetites and like to eat and their human servants are often left starving if food is scarce. Oni are almost immortal. If their body is slain, their spirit will survive. If the spirit is not slain or banished as well, it will reform a new body over time. Their residual spirit form is a ghost and can be banished.
